queries.text:
Faces
| where isnotempty(FaceId)
| extend facesStart = todatetime(facesStart) 
| extend facesEnd = todatetime(facesEnd) 
| extend appearanceTime = datetime_diff('millisecond', facesEnd, facesStart)
| summarize appearanceTime = sum(appearanceTime), take_any(FaceName) by FaceId
| top 10 by appearanceTime
| extend appearanceTime = appearanceTime / 1000 / 60
| extend appearanceTime = strcat(tostring(appearanceTime), " min")
| project FaceName, appearanceTime

Topics
| where isnotempty(topicId)
| summarize occurrences = dcount(id), take_any(topicname) by topicId
| top 10 by occurrences
| project topicname, occurrences

Brands
| where isnotempty(BrandId)
| extend facesStart = todatetime(brandsStart) 
| extend facesEnd = todatetime(brandsEnd) 
| extend appearanceTime = datetime_diff('millisecond', facesEnd, facesStart)
| summarize appearanceTime = sum(appearanceTime), take_any(Brandname) by BrandId
| top 10 by appearanceTime
| extend appearanceTime = appearanceTime / 1000 / 60
| extend appearanceTime = strcat(tostring(appearanceTime), " min")
| project Brandname, appearanceTime

Indexer
| summarize totledurationInSecond = sum(durationInSeconds) by indexingPreset
| extend indexingPreset = case(indexingPreset == "BasicVideo","Basic Video",
                         indexingPreset == "VideoOnly","Standard Video",
                         indexingPreset == "AdvancedVideo","Advanced Video",
                         indexingPreset == "BasicAudio","Basic Audio",
                         indexingPreset == "AudioOnly","Standard Audio",
                         indexingPreset == "AdvancedAudio","Advance dAudio",
                         "Default")
| extend totledurationInSecond = totledurationInSecond / 60
| extend totledurationInSecond = strcat(tostring(totledurationInSecond), " min")
| project str = strcat("**", totledurationInSecond, " " , indexingPreset, "**")
| summarize result = strcat_array(make_list(str), "  \n")

Indexer
| summarize totalVideos = dcount(id)
| project strcat("Total Videos : ", totalVideos)

Indexer
| summarize users = dcount(userName)
| project strcat("Users : ", users)

Indexer
| where created >= ago(365d)
| extend created = todatetime(created)
| summarize totledurationInSecond = sum(durationInSeconds) by bin(created, 30d)
| extend totledurationInSecond = totledurationInSecond / 60
| project created, totledurationInSecond
